message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe could greatly benefit your business. Given its high quality and unique features, I propose a starting price of $8500. This is a special introductory offer tailored for potential buyers like yourself.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7200. This is a competitive price that I'm willing to pay for the product.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value of the product and the benefits it provides, I am willing to negotiate further. My proposal for the product price is $7600.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6800. This is a fair price that I'm willing to pay for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After considering your offer and reevaluating our costs and margins, I am prepared to offer the product at $7000. This price reflects a balance between our interests and yours.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to pay for the product.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept an offer of $6750 for the product. This price allows us to maintain our profit margin while still being competitive in the market.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6400. This is the best price I'm willing to pay for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. After reviewing our costs and assessing the market conditions, I am willing to accept an offer of $6550 for the product. This price reflects a fair compromise between our interests.
I appreciate your persistence, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6200. This is the lowest price I'm willing to pay for the product.
